Name: La Perla
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Simple yet complex, this beautifully balanced cocktail has faint saltiness from the manzanilla, delicate pear fruit and well-integrated fortifying tequila.
History: Created in 2005 by Jacques Bezuidenhaut at Tres Agaves, San Francisco, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of La Perla contains 191 calories
